comment_text: A small step in finding life!

Kepler-186f is about 490 light years from Earth. That is a mere fraction of our galaxy's 100,000 light year diameter. But it is still a very long way away from us. 1 Light Year = 5.8 Trillion Miles... Now multiply 5.8 Trillion by 490 & you can conclude that Kepler-186f is roughly 2.8 Quadrillion miles from earth. That is VERY FAR.
